title: Aerials show devastation wrought by Hurricane Maria
description:
(29 Sep 2017) Aerials of over Toa Baja, Puerto Rico, Thursday, showed the devastation and destruction wreaked by Hurricane Maria when it barrelled through on September 20.  
Maria struck Puerto Rico as a Category 4 storm, the strongest to hit the island in a century. 
At least 16 people died and nearly all 3.4 million people on the island were left without power and most without water.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/0e2b2136cf94b7a20855b881e0767399 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
